name: Oganro
tag_list: online-booking-system, airline-reservation-system, ecommerce-solutions, travel-portal-development, enterprise-portal-development, web-portal-development, web-development-company, web-services-company, web-ap
overview:
Oganro Ltd is the one of the leading custom software developers in Sri Lanka, We are specialised in Travel Agent GDS System Developments.

Oganro is master of providing consultation & development for all the aspects of B2B (business to business) & B2C (business to customer) travel agent system and integration of various APIs for Air booking, hotel booking, travel packages, bus booking and insurance , payment gateway integration, user login, agent login & deposit account and comprehensive admin consoles. We also do white labelling & search widget designing for all categories of Sri Lankan travel agents. We are well seasoned & fully experienced and have worked with all the leading global branded GDS/APIs such as Amadeus, GTA, Kuoni, Tourico, Rooms XML and Hotels Beds ect..

Other than above we are excelled our services across below categories as well Professional Web Design in Sri Lanka - We make sure deliver Creative, Fresh and innovative Website Design solutions to Companies based in Sri Lanka.ll of our design work is bespoke & individual to each project, we will make sure tailored your website design especially to your requirements,We will make sure each project delivers best of client taste as well as to match with global standards.

eCommerce Websites - We deliver Complete eCommerce Website Solutions to organisation across Sri Lanka. We will make sure to provide quality, cutting edge & cost-effective eCommerce website solution for our clients.

Mobile Application Development in Sri Lanka - Oganro has Sri Lanka based team of expert mobile applications developers who can understand local customer needs , requirements and designs easily. We can develop mobile application according to your specific needs. We will make sure our customized mobile applications will perform and give best customer experience.

SEO Services - Oganro is a search engine optimisation company & Web Marketing Agency with a difference; we do SEO projects to make sure your website is placed in front of people who are potential clients who will want to buy from you. But our services don’t stop there: our work is part of a complete marketing approach which will make sure your business gets the most out of the internet

Quickbooks & Sage Line 50 Accounting Services in Sri Lanka - Oganro offers finance and accounting services to Sri Lankan clients around Colombo District, Get your day-to-day, monthly or yearly accounting duties done by our member or team of Qualified Charted accountants or qualified Bookkeepers for a competitive low cost. Our accountants & bookkeepers are well seasoned, professional & well experienced. They understand your business and are trained to work closely with you as your own team

Feel free to contact us for a free consultation, please visit http://www.oganro.com . You can call us on +94 (0)11 523 8525 from Sri Lanka or +44 (0)20 3384 7877 and email us at info@oganro.com. With Regards, OGANRO Ltd http://www.oganro.com
